name: Whip It Good
description: "Whip It Good" is a small puzzle game that is basically a 2-D representation of the "Whip It" from the 1980s.  If you've heard of the Rubik's Cube, then chances are you've heard of the Whip It (I had both).  Anyway, all you have to do is scramble the colors and then line them up again by rotating the tiers and moving tiles into and out of the empty space.
